content.description:
POPULATION PYRAMID

The population pyramid shown represents a local area that has been affected by human migration.
content.question:
A. Describe the rate of natural increase indicated by the shape of the population pyramid shown.

B. Explain ONE cultural factor that may contribute to the local population trend shown in the graph.

C. Explain the degree to which economic push factors may affect the population structure for the community shown in the graph.

D. Explain a possible outcome regarding future employment needs based on the population pyramid shown.

skill.text: Skill 3.E: Explain what maps or data imply or illustrate about geographic principles, processes, and outcomes.
